name: Tank Shooter (Liam Chessell)
description:
### Tank Shooter ###

Move in four directions using the arrow keys, and use A to shoot.

Increase your score by picking up bonuses as well as shooting enemies.

Try to stay alive as long as you can!

Updates for 26/02/17:

- Tanks can now chase you or flee from you!

- Some tanks will also try and shoot you!

- Code refactoring.

### Credits ###

BGM - Austrian Army (Youtube Audio Library)

Developed in Unity by Liam Chessell
